Эти малыши иногда заглядывают и к нам в мир чтобы позвать нас вместе с ними прогуляться по загадочным лугам и просто весело провести время.

programme.title: Щелкунчик
programme.desc: Молодая девушка, убираясь под елкой, находит игрушку в виде Щелкунчика для орехов. Щелкунчик оживает и рассказывает ей грустную историю о своём проклятии и коварной королеве мышиного царства. Вдруг откуда-то из угла комнаты слышится странный звук. По стене пробегают трещины, и из пролома появляется мышиный царь. Он стал большим и страшным, но и сам Щелкунчик возмужал и готовится дать бой ужасу из прошлого.

programme.title: Приключения летающей собачки
programme.desc: Однажды щенок Випо узнал, что он особенный. Ведь он умеет летать с помощью своих огромных ушей! И теперь очаровательный песик и его лучшие друзья, аист Генри и игрушечная кошка Бетти, отправляются в захватывающее кругосветное путешествие.

Этот мультфильм наглядный пример поговорки, в которой говорится: "на ошибках учатся"

programme.title: Газун
programme.desc: Мультфильм для детей дошкольного возраста. Забавные приключения семерых друзей: слона, птички, змеи, страуса, зебры и двух жирафов. Они живут в далекой африке среди зеленой травы и фиолетовых баобабов, где каждый день происходят удивительные истории. Искрометный юмор, обаятельные герои и красочная 3-D анимация не оставят равнодушными ни детей, ни взрослых!

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса.

programme.title: Маленькие пингвинята
programme.desc: Не только дети, но и маленькие пингвинята хотят всё знать. В добром и замечательном мультфильме для наших маленьких зрителей невероятные приключения, великие открытия и много новых настоящих друзей!

programme.title: Приключения Тимми
programme.desc: "Маленький барашек Тимми, вместе со своими юными друзьями с фермы, отлично проводит время в детском саду, под надзором доброй цапли Гарриет и мудрого Филина Осборна. Там он учится многим хорошим вещам, в том числе и хорошему поведению. Немного упрямый и озорной Тимми может иногда напроказничать, но воспитатели всегда укажут ему на его ошибки и Тимми больше никогда не будет их повторять. О похождениях этого сорванца и будет идти речь в данном мультфильме."

programme.title: Приключения Ади в подводном мире
programme.desc: Ади и его забавный желтый друг Вупс – два невероятно любопытных инопланетянина. Они прилетели на Землю, чтобы выяснить, как здесь все устроено и познакомиться с жителями планеты. Друзья открывают чудеса подводного мира. Они изучают дельфинов, акул, осьминогов и волшебные кораллы, спускаются в самые глубокие пещеры моря и исследуют подводные течения.

programme.title: Маленькая рыбка
programme.desc: Веселая и забавная рыбка по имени Пузырек очень хочет принести счастье своей семье!

programme.title: Приключения звездного кота
programme.desc: "Звездный кот Мэджик любит пошалить! Но за шалости приходится расплачиваться. Вот и теперь пришлось Мэджику отправиться в путешествие по космической вселенной не на экскурсию, а чтобы арестовать ужасного Черного Дьявола, которого Мэджик выпустил из заточения. Это очень сложная и опасная затея.

programme.title: Daudz laimes, jubilār! Arhibīskaps Jānis Vanags

Latin American Hot Borders
programme.desc: Latin American Hot Borders is a documentary series on National Geographic that follows stressful and tough working days of Customs officers. The borders in Latin America separate one country from another and at the same time legal from illegal as well. The viewers will witness a battle against the crime that goes to the extreme. Latin America is in the front line in a war against human trafficking, drugs, weapons and alcohol smuggling, money laundry, illegal immigration. In case this war is lost, the consequences can be terrible for many people.

programme.title: The Border
programme.desc: In this episode of Border Wars agents and officers of the Department of Homeland Security in Puerto Rico keep a high-value seizure secure as they transport it back to San Juan, find and seize a small drug-running boat in the dangerous Mona Passage and stall for time as they await information from the New York Police Department on a suspected drug smuggler who just entered Puerto Rico from the Dominican Republic.

programme.title: Breakout
programme.desc: Three inmates hatch a daring and ingenious plan to escape from Indiana State Prison, where many of the prisoners are locked up for murder. Convicted rapist Lance Battreal decides to break out when he learns his father is ill and could die within months. In 2009 he and convicted killers Mark Booher and Charlie Smith dig their way into a system of tunnels under the prison. They cut through a series of security gates to reach a narrow storm drain which leads all the way a nearby city. They must crawl much of the way, in a journey as tortuous as it is long. But when they exit a manhole on 10th Street they are free. Hours later the escape is discovered and the manhunt begins.

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures
programme.desc: Nazi Megastructures is a documentary TV series, a spinoff of the broader Megastructures TV series. It focuses on Nazi Germany's various military engineering projects during World War II. The series explores the artifacts of the powerful evil empire built to secure world's domination, and reveals dark engineering secrets of iconic Nazi Megastructures. To control nations and conquer the world, Nazi create huge terror machines, superguns and weapons of mass destruction. Take a look at the remains of most impressive megastructures that changed the world forever.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: After a career-ending fall, skier Nick Brewer and a partner hatch a plan to smuggle cocaine into Europe – in wine bottles. Chef Gordon Malloch starts a new life in Saudi Arabia but when he begins bootlegging wine, he becomes the toast of the ex-pat party scene. High demand brings Gordon to the attention of a Saudi prince looking for supply. But when Gordon is caught, he is sentenced to years in prison, and 400 lashes.

programme.title: Bloody Tales of Europe
programme.desc: Tudor Historian Dr. Suzannah Lipscomb and journalist Joe Crowley team up to investigate three of history's most mysterious MURDERS. How did legendary warrior-king Attila the Hun end up dead the morning after his wedding? Did Richard III really kill his own young nephews in the Tower of London? And who was behind the mafia-style hit that took out Juan Borgia – son of Rome's Godfather, Pope Alexander VI.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Discover how old world flavour is lovingly baked into rustic and crusty Baltic dark rye bread; sweet and chewy Duo cookies cater to the tastes of chocolate and vanilla lovers alike; tangy Japanese ginger carrot dressing complements Western as well as Asian dishes; and fluffy, crunchy, chocolaty Rocky Road bars are carefully built on a sumptuous bed of creamy marshmallow. From raw materials to finished products, FOOD FACTORY reveals in awe-inspiring detail how mass-produced favourites are really made. Put on a hardhat and get ready to meet the food!

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Discover how humble rice and sugar are transformed into a gooey, crunchy marshmallow bar topped with rainbow-coloured chocolate chips; the root, stem and flowery part of a Japanese plant are pureed into a delicate but very spicy sidekick to sushi; meatless deli magicians, Tofurky, turn soy milk into mouthwateringly aromatic Italian veggie sausages; and, how many microscopic layers are baked into the flaky dough of a sinfully moist and tender Mini Choco bun. From raw materials to finished products, FOOD FACTORY reveals in awe-inspiring detail how mass-produced favourites are really made. Put on a hardhat and get ready to meet the food!

programme.title: Bid & Destroy
programme.desc: Brian, Lee, and the rest of Danley Demolition are in Claremont, New Hampshire to take down an part of a paper mill. It's a hotspot for partying teenagers so the valuables could have been picked clean long ago. Brian and Eric are surprised to find a Winnebago, several snowmobiles, and a vintage voltage regulator…but the mill also comes with a major liability-a towering smoke stack that must come down without hitting any of the surrounding buildings or the members of the Danley Demo crew.

programme.title: Filthy Riches
programme.desc: Across the U.S., men and women battle the elements to make a living off the land. In the forests of Michigan, Chris Matherly and Levena Holmes search high and low for prized wild mushrooms. They have a large order from a new client, but only limited time to fill it. Chris and Levena struggle to find the right mushrooms and are running out of time. In Chico, CA, Al takes a huge risk on a large burl. This burl could mean a big payday for Al, or it could be worthless. On the Delaware River, Ray is not catching as many eels as he should. He suspects something, or someone, is stealing his eels. Can his new surveillance system catch the thief? In Maine, Jim and Andy run into their rivals: the clam diggers. Both groups need the mudflats to make a living.

programme.title: Ultimate Supercar
programme.desc: A must see for petrolheads and connoisseurs, this series takes the viewer behind the scenes at some of the most legendary automobile manufacturers on the planet to reveal how their supercars are designed, engineered and constructed. From the DBS Superleggera of the last truly independent marque, Aston Marton, to Ferrari's best-selling Portofino and from rapper's favourite, the Bentley Continental GT. to the over-the-top Lamborghini Aventador SVJ, we learn what makes these beautiful machines unique and how it is the small, individual engineering secrets that make all the difference and ensure their mythical status and economic success.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw, a car enthusiast and TV presenter teams up with master mechanic Fuzz Townshend to rescue rusty old cars and classic vehicles from their former neglected lives. People can nominate a relative or friend without them knowing if they've been unable to restore the car themselves for any reason from medical issues to financial problems. A team of experts work hard to restore the vehicles to their former glory and once they have been revamped the owner is surprised with a reunion, usually at a staged event organised by Tim Shaw.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Today Tim and Fuzz are off to Leeds to take on one of the most beautiful British sports cars that no one has ever heard of: the AC Aceca. Most people are aware of the AC Cobra, but not many know about its predecessor the incredibly rare and extremely valuable Aceca. Today's car has been kept and loved by its owner Monet since the early 70s, however years of suffering ill health has meant his beloved car has ended up rotting away in his garage. Monet's son Richard wrote in to Car SOS in the hope that the team could give a new lease of life to his Dad by stealing the car away and surprising him with a fully restored motor. The boys oblige and set to task on what turns out to be one of the most heartwarming stories and certainly most beautiful, finished cars to date.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: North vs. South
programme.desc: Wicked Tuna: North vs. South is a reality TV series, a spin off of the original series of Wicked Tuna. It is about commercial tuna fishermen from New England who fish for the lucrative Atlantic bluefin tuna off the coast of North Carolina. The teams of fishermen compete with each other to see who can catch the most fish. As a conservation measure there is an overall quota of approximately 200 individual fish. As well there are new techniques and methods how to catch tuna.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: After a career-ending fall, skier Nick Brewer and a partner hatch a plan to smuggle cocaine into Europe – in wine bottles. Chef Gordon Malloch starts a new life in Saudi Arabia but when he begins bootlegging wine, he becomes the toast of the ex-pat party scene. High demand brings Gordon to the attention of a Saudi prince looking for supply. But when Gordon is caught, he is sentenced to years in prison, and 400 lashes.

programme.title: Big Fish Texas
programme.desc: Big Fish Texas follows Galveston's Guindon family as they try to keep Katie's Seafood Market – their family business – growing and thriving at all costs. A homegrown enterprise built both on land and at sea, the challenges at Katie's are everywhere. On the water, they battle against long days, longer nights, a sea full of predators, and Mother Nature's whims. At home base, they struggle to juggle surpluses, shortages, and orders while also processing a quarter of the Gulf's deep-water fish and spearheading initiatives to preserve their fishery. But no matter how busy the business keeps them, at the end of the day this is a family built on old-fashioned values, and they'd never miss an opportunity to get together for a good laugh and a home-cooked meal.

programme.title: Monster Fish
programme.desc: There are fish, …and then there are FISH. Lurking in the murky depths of the world's great waterways are bizarre giants-specimens of such enormous proportion and odd appearance they boggle the mind. In his quest to save the world's big fish, aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan has wrangled some of the biggest freshwater fish in the world. In this episode, we follow him as he goes in search of one of North America's toothiest and most misunderstood monster fish: the alligator gar. These bizarre creatures reach lengths of 10 feet and have a mouthful of razor-sharp teeth. They've disappeared from their former northern ranges, and are now disappearing from the bayous and marshes of the southern United States. They're under assault because of their fearsome appearance, rumors of attacks on humans, and the belief by some anglers who believe they devour game fish. We join Zeb Hogan as he comes face to face with an alligator gar and discovers if the myths about this monster are true.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to your final destination: a long, lonely stretch in a dark and dangerous prison, far from home.Banged Up Abroad takes you inside accounts of capture, incarceration and terror far away from home with intimate personal interviews and dramatic re-enactments. In the new series, you'll hear more first-hand accounts not only from those who were locked up, but also from those who were directly part of the story. Whether it is the undercover agent compiling the evidence against the suspect, or the person making the drug-dealing offers, you relive the stories from every angle.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: Banged Up Abroad is a British docudrama television series following stories of people who have been arrested while travelling abroad. It seems like you are watching a blood-freezing thriller, except for it is based on real events and real people. You'll see how a trip to paradise can turn into hell and end up in prison in an unknown country and it will make your hair stand. People get into troubles for trying to smuggle drugs, sometimes they are kidnapped or captured. The series is a mixture of interviews with the real people and actors reconstructing the events. We find out what it is like to be in prison abroad, without help and money, not knowing the language, and what are the terrible consequences for the family members. The series is a warning for all careless tourists, it shows vividly how easy and fast it is to hit rock bottom.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: After a career-ending fall, skier Nick Brewer and a partner hatch a plan to smuggle cocaine into Europe – in wine bottles. Chef Gordon Malloch starts a new life in Saudi Arabia but when he begins bootlegging wine, he becomes the toast of the ex-pat party scene. High demand brings Gordon to the attention of a Saudi prince looking for supply. But when Gordon is caught, he is sentenced to years in prison, and 400 lashes.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: Europe from Above takes to the air over Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Poland, Spain and the UK to showcase Europe's finest cultural and geographical landmarks as you've never seen them before. Stunning aerial hyper-lapse photography allows us to visualise the changes of a season in seconds, as tulip fields in the Netherlands magically burst into colour and waterfalls in the Dolomites turn to ice. We reveal how tradition, engineering and natural wonders have shaped this epic continent – a vibrant portrait of these regions and the people who keep their traditions alive.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Discover how cool and refreshing frozen yogurt gets its dizzying layers of crunchy toffee and peanut butter swirl; the origin of crispy spring rolls and what really goes into plum sauce; Purdy's rich and gooey Sweet Georgia Browns get their mouthwatering salty sweet balance; and double-the-pleasure brie gets its fuzzy white coat and creamy goodness. From raw materials to finished products, FOOD FACTORY reveals in awe-inspiring detail how mass-produced favourites are really made. Put on a hardhat and get ready to meet the food!

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Discover how sweet, crispy waffle cones get their ice cream-ready shape; rich, dark chocolate milk is transformed from creamy to dreamy; tangy Doritos nachos go from kernel to crunchy chip; and how the special ingredient in cheesy Indian dessert Kesar Rasmalai could break the bank. From raw materials to finished products, FOOD FACTORY reveals in awe-inspiring detail how mass-produced favourites are really made. Put on a hardhat and get ready to meet the food!

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Korean Air Cargo Flight #8509 Boeing 747-Freighter Scheduled to return to Seoul via Milan, Italy, Korean Air Cargo Flight #8509 idles on the tarmac at England's Stansted Airport. With a new crew on board and nearly an hour behind schedule, the aircraft finally takes off and climbs to 2,500 feet. But just a few seconds later, the plane banks sharply to the left and slams into a field northeast of London. All four crewmembers die instantly in the huge explosion and a massive crater 30 feet deep marks the point of impact. It is Korean Airlines' fifth major accident in two-and-a-half years and as investigators unravel the case, their search for answers leads them to back Korea.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they don't happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: A Gathering Storm
programme.desc: A major global series forming a unique view on the planet's fiercest storms, through the experience of people who work at sea inside the major hurricane zones of the world. Through extensive access agreements, hundreds of cameras are embedded on boats, ships and oil platforms. So as the storm approaches and the clock ticks down we are with the men who witness weather at its wildest, from all angles. All face different challenges, with different cargoes, deadlines and routes. At stake is the job, their cargo, their equipment... and their lives. We tell their greatest stories; the triumphs of engineering, ingenuity and sheer bravery that go along with working in storms at sea. Through their eyes we witness the rise of the storm. And we experience what it takes to get their job done in the face of nature's wildest weather. To explain what lies behind the unpredictability and danger unfolding on the ocean's surface, these first hand stories combine with scientific insight, analysis and satellite mapping. This dual perspective on one compelling story, brings together real human urgency and global weather science.

programme.title: Drain Alcatraz
programme.desc: Drain Alcatraz uses cutting edge visual effects to ´drain´ the waters around the notorious island of Alcatraz. With the waters drained away the secrets of Alcatraz are revealed, including exactly why the island´s infamous prison was so inescapable. With no water in the way San Francisco Bay is revealed to be a fascinating and chaotic place. On the dry bay floor we see the scars left by epic earthquakes. These fault lines give scientists an idea as to when and where the next ´big one´ will strike. With the whole area drained it´s possible to see what could happen to San Francisco when the next giant quake hits, as well as what will be left of Alcatraz once the dust settles.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: Freddy is looking for a response from Summer after telling her how he feels. The band agrees to help Dewey save a local ice cream shop, but first have to get out of an escape room challenge Principal Mullins signed them up for.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: Count along with Josh & Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to find out what Blue wants to buy at the store. We help Shovel & Pail learn who has more graham crackers then help Josh discover what he can buy with his Blue dollars.

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: The owner of Butterbean's Cafe in the magical land of Puddlebrook is fairy Butterbean. Her cafe is a very comfortable and warm place, popular for its various dishes- cakes, pancakes, cookies, banana bread, salads cooked by herself, her friends Poppy, Dazzle, Jasper and her sister Poppy. Friends use extraordinary cooking appliances and a magic secret ingredient, that is why everything is so special and yummy. Their jealous rival is Ms. Marmalady, things are not going great at her cafe so she desperately wants to put Butterbean out of business. But true friendship and friends' support can conquer evil.

programme.title: Barbapapa – One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family. Each 11 minute episode will take a lead from Michael Bond's original books and, with the spirit of the new Paddington movies, tell brand new Paddington stories in an exciting new animated form. The show will appeal to both children and adults alike – adults will recognise the Paddington they know and love, and young children will discover him for the first time. The show is heavily influenced by the Paddington Feature Films but a key difference is the characters especially the Brown family have been aged down, more of a young family starting out than the comfortable middle aged ones we see in the films.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: PAW Patrol is a preschool series starring a pack of six heroic puppies: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Zuma, Rubble, and Skye, who are led by a tech-savvy 10-year-old boy named Ryder. With a unique blend of problem-solving skills, cool vehicles and lots of cute doggy humor, the PAW Patrol works together on high-stakes rescue missions to protect the Adventure Bay community.From Marshall the firedog to Chase the police pup to Skye, who flies high in her copter, each pup brings unique personality and skill to the team, modeling the importance of teamwork and good citizenship. They all have special Pup Packs on their backs to help them handle anything – from rescuing kittens to saving a train from a rockslide! And no matter how big the adventure, the PAW Patrol always has time for a game, a laugh, and an ear scratch from Ryder.Fun PAW Patrol Fact: Ryder rescued all the pups and taught them their PAW Patrol skills.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When a high utility bill threatens Hector and Rosa's annual trip, Ronnie Anne spearheads an effort to lower usage. Desperate for their own space, Ronnie Anne and Sid find a hidden room and try to keep it a secret from the other tenants.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When Carl witnesses Ronnie Anne save a dog, he becomes obsessed with being just like his newfound hero. Ronnie Anne secretly starts watching her family's favorite telenovela after refusing to watch it with them.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn are quadruplets with only two things in common: their birthday and parents. This dynamic foursome battle sibling rivalry at every turn, but in the end when they are together, nothing can stop them.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Young Dylan's grandmother decides to send him to live indefinitely with her affluent son's family. The Wilson family household is soon turned upside down as lifestyles clash between aspiring hip hop star and his straight-laced cousins.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Ever wonder what it's like to grow up in a big family? Eleven-year-old Lincoln Loud gives viewers an inside look at how to survive the chaos of a huge household, especially as the only boy with ten sisters!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: For Halloween Lincoln and Clyde have scoped out a fancy neighborhood to make their dreams of scoring full size candy bars a reality. Meanwhile, Lucy is putting on a haunted maze and the younger girls scheme to get maximum candy.

programme.title: City Adventures
programme.desc: Welcome to LEGO City. A modern metropolis filled with the fiercest firefighters, the cream of the crop cops, and so many BLOCKHEADS. Every citizen will assemble together for the most awesomely awesome adventures.

Yet somehow, in the cosmic game of genetic roulette, Phoebe popped out of the womb good, while Max came out evil. This super-sibling rivalry, coupled with the typical school/family issues faced by your average kid ultimately leads to a series of hilarious situations.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Everyone with siblings knows that sibling rivalry is a real thing, so imagine the sibling rivalry between quadruplets. That's everyday life for the Harper quadruplets Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn.Whilst you might assume they get on well, these four siblings have absolutely nothing in common which normally leads to family fights. Although everyday life can be tough they have to learn to work together to solve the endless problems that they find themselves facing. Produced by Nickelodeon this lighthearted American comedy series is sure to have you fits of giggles.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack
programme.desc: Animated children's series centering on 13-year-old Ollie and his magical backpack, a portal to the Monsterverse. Helping him protect the backpack are his best friends Cleo and Bernie, along with monster trainer Captain Wowski. The trio of friends embark on wild adventures in both the real world and the monster realm, but most importantly they must ensure the backpack is safe and sound at all times. Ollie helps the monsters and they help him in return, as he secretly utilises their special abilities and talents in the real world

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: After seeing a scary movie (that his parents told him not to), Lincoln can't go to sleep and pulls an all-nighter. When a common cold ravages through the loud house, Lincoln believes his sisters have turned into Zombies!

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Just Add Magic
programme.desc: In order to convince Jake thatmagic is real, the Girls cook three mystery spells for him to try. Unfortunately, Jake isn't easily convinced, and the unexpected downsides jeopardize Hannah's chances of winning a school-wide fund raising contest.

programme.title: Goldie's Oldies
programme.desc: 14 yr old Goldie's life is turned upside down when her family moves in with her Grandpa Maury and his three 70 something, totally bonkers housemates. Goldie's landed herself the ultimate insta-family!...If she can keep everyone together.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When Carl witnesses Ronnie Anne save a dog, he becomes obsessed with being just like his newfound hero. Ronnie Anne secretly starts watching her family's favorite telenovela after refusing to watch it with them.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: Парижские тайны
programme.desc: Исторический триллер о загадочных убийствах в самом романтичном городе мира. Париж, конец XIX века. По городу прокатывается серия загадочных убийств в самых известных и культурно значимых местах города: кабаре Мулен Руж, Парижская опера, Эйфелева башня… Смотрите детективный сериал с французским колоритом.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Самые шокирующие гипотезы" – документальный проект телеканала РЕН ТВ. Мы дадим новые ответы на старые вопросы и зададим свои. Факты, о которых долго молчали наши коллеги-журналисты и независимая оценка событий, изменивших мир; расследования самых сенсационных историй и свежий взгляд на, казалось бы, общеизвестные исторические факты; поиск закономерностей и параллелей в самых невероятных явлениях нашей жизни, новости из всех областей человеческих знаний и загадки потаённых уголков нашего подсознания. Всё, что вас так долго интересовало, и всё, что может коснуться каждого из нас.

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Пападос-шоу
programme.desc: Юмористическая телепрограмма подарит телезрителям массу эмоций — от восторга до испуга. В каждом выпуске телешоу "Пападос шоу" собраны розыгрыши, снятые скрытой камерой в разных странах мира. Это нестандартные ситуации, вызывающие неожиданную реакцию прохожих. Камера фиксирует, как реагируют люди разного возраста на унитаз или душевую кабину в лифте, труп на улице или пленника в багажнике машины. Ведущие предлагают повторить пранки, а автор лучшего видео может получить приз от программы.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Самые шокирующие гипотезы" – документальный проект телеканала РЕН ТВ. Мы дадим новые ответы на старые вопросы и зададим свои. Факты, о которых долго молчали наши коллеги-журналисты и независимая оценка событий, изменивших мир; расследования самых сенсационных историй и свежий взгляд на, казалось бы, общеизвестные исторические факты; поиск закономерностей и параллелей в самых невероятных явлениях нашей жизни, новости из всех областей человеческих знаний и загадки потаённых уголков нашего подсознания. Всё, что вас так долго интересовало, и всё, что может коснуться каждого из нас.

programme.title: Когда мы дома
programme.desc: Об эволюции семейных отношений – от начала совместной жизни и до старости. Главные герои – пять украинских семейных пар разного возраста и степени развития отношений, которые не знакомы между собой. События в комедийном сериале разворачиваются в стенах квартир, в которых проживают пары, и построены на коротких историях из семейной жизни.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Персонажами шоу становятся обычные врачи и больные, ГАИшники и нарушители, родители и дети, полицейские и хулиганы, пилоты и стюардессы, офисные работники и даже стриптизёрши.

programme.title: Высотка
programme.desc: Место, где ПОРОЙ от некоторых соседей ничего не скроешь, где ПОРОЙ соседи знают о жизни друг друга больше, чем о собственной, где слухи распространяются по всем квартирам за секунды, – это "Высотка". Комедийный сериал о насыщенной жизни обитателей самого обычного многоквартирного дома. Здесь вы найдете и стража порядка, что в собственной квартире устроил "обезьянник", и медиков, что владеют частной клиникой на одном из этажей, и консьержку, которая день за днем сражается с местным тусовщиком. Здесь есть даже свой супергерой – Человек-петух, который готов в любой момент прийти на помощь. А еще жителям дома не дает покоя, что на одном из этажей поселилась ЗВЕЗДА. Здесь идет война за каждый децибел звука, за каждый удар перфоратора в воскресенье, за каждое парковочное место на детской площадке...

programme.title: Слепая
programme.desc: Прабабка ее матери была травницей. Помогала бесплодным. Лечила больных животных. С другой ее прабабкой в детстве случилась беда. Из-за сильного сколиоза у маленькой девочки вырос горб. После этого у нее открылся дар целительства. Когда врачи отказывались лечить, больных посылали к ней. А ее саму сравнивают с Вангой. Ведь она тоже слепой не родилась. Виной всему стала трагическая случайность. В первом классе мальчишка попал ей в глаза обледенелым куском угля. Вскоре зрение стало стремительно падать. Лекарства не помогали. Врачи разводили руками, не в силах помочь. Когда она практически ослепла, это и произошло. Она увидела людей, но по-другому. Она не очень любит говорить о себе или о том, кто и зачем к ней обращается. Живет уединенно, в глуши. Но тех, кто приходит — принимает. Ведь знает, когда у человека что-то не так, потому что видит — видит не его одежду или прическу, а видит его судьбу.

programme.title: Морские дьяволы
programme.desc: В сериале идёт рассказ о работе и взаимоотношениях членов специального подразделения. Его сформировали из лучших обученных бойцов для возможности вести бои во всех трёх ипостасях: на морских, земных и воздушных просторах. Их группа состоит из четвёрки отважных людей, каждый из которой способен работать за всех остальных. Их стали все и повсеместно называть "морскими дьяволами" ведь основные миссии, ставящие перед ними, связаны именно с водной стихией. Пока ещё не было перед ними поставлено такой задачи, которая стала неподвластной этой четвёрке. Каждый из них уникален по-своему и хоть они очень разные, но придерживаются одной цели – всегда с честью подходить к выполнению профессионального долга.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Персонажами шоу становятся обычные врачи и больные, ГАИшники и нарушители, родители и дети, полицейские и хулиганы, пилоты и стюардессы, офисные работники и даже стриптизёрши.

programme.title: Пападос-шоу
programme.desc: Юмористическая телепрограмма подарит телезрителям массу эмоций — от восторга до испуга. В каждом выпуске телешоу "Пападос шоу" собраны розыгрыши, снятые скрытой камерой в разных странах мира. Это нестандартные ситуации, вызывающие неожиданную реакцию прохожих. Камера фиксирует, как реагируют люди разного возраста на унитаз или душевую кабину в лифте, труп на улице или пленника в багажнике машины. Ведущие предлагают повторить пранки, а автор лучшего видео может получить приз от программы.

programme.title: Разрушители легенд
programme.desc: Каждый из выпусков "Разрушители легенд" посвящён двум и более городским легендам, распространённым убеждениям или слухам из интернета. Основной миф часто требует всесторонней подготовки и специального полигона для испытания; кроме него в передачу также включают один-два не столь хлопотных в плане подготовки и проведения мифа. Некоторые эксперименты оказываются настолько сложными, что им посвящается весь час, отведённый на передачу. Иногда для проверки целого комплекса связанных мифов выпуск длится вдвое дольше обычного. Ведущие Джейми Хайнеман и Адам Сэвидж больше 30 лет работали в сфере кинопроизводства (в области спецэффектов) Они были главными техниками в Звёздных войнах (например, программировали движения дроидов). Впоследствии они стали использовать свои обширные инженерные знания и богатый опыт конструирования для создания сложных механических устройств, используемых в проведении экспериментов. Они разрабатывают, собирают и используют эти механизмы в мастерской спецэффектов M5 Industries Хайнемана. Часто испытания проходят и в других местах Сан-Франциско и его окрестностей, в том числе на бывшей военно-морской авиабазе в Аламиде, бывшей авиабазе ВВС "Хэмилтон" в Новато, на гражданском авиакосмическом полигоне "Мохаве Спейспорт", или в пустыне Мохаве, где проверяются мифы, связанные с ракетами.

programme.title: Izstāsti Latvijai

programme.title: Vēlais ar Streipu
programme.desc: Ikdienas satīrisko ziņu vakara šovs ar Kārli Streipu, kurā tiek apskatītas un analizētas dažādas sabiedrībā aktuālas tēmas.

programme.title: Preses klubs
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījums, kurā raidījuma vadītājs ar trim viesiem apspriež konkrētās dienas aktualitātes.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: Philippe Cousteau Jr., grandson of the legendary Jacques Cousteau, explores the most breath-taking places on the earth. Documentary TV series Xploration Awesome Planet takes you on incredible journey around our unique planet to experience its outstanding power and beauty. Philippe uses unbeatable combination of passion, deep knowledge and infectious enthusiasm to show us dynamic forces of earth, its miraculous wonders from the tops of the highest mountains to the depths of the oceans, various ecosystems, extreme weather, waterfalls and caves, geisers and glaciers, volcanoes and beaches of all colors of rainbow, various species of animals and birds and their habitats.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmares of Nature
programme.desc: Naomi travels the world to find the worst nightmare of nature.

programme.title: The Mystery Files
programme.desc: A little bit of mystery makes history a lot more fun. Join cousins E.B and Kyla, as they unwrap the clues left for them by the mysterious Great Aunt Hermione and every Mystery File leads to a new adventure! The Sherlockian duo have inherited the mixed-up files of Great Aunt Hermione, explorer extraordinaire. Each file presents three seemingly unrelated objects from the past, and it's up to the gang to figure out how these artifacts connect to who we are and how we live now. Each mystery unravels new discoveries from around the world, like: How has the invention of flight changed the "size" of our world? Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Junior Vets
programme.desc: Six children get the opportunity to see what it is like to be a veterinarian first hand. The kids get to go to the University of Edinburgh to attend within the Royal School Of Veterinary Studies where they get to go into the veterinary hospitals and get involved in the real life cases. In hopes of inspiring the children about veterinary practices the kids get to get hands on in helping the ill animals and are taught how to get them back to health. Going through a range of challenges the children attend events, zoos and wildlife hospitals treating an array of animals. At the end of the series on of the participants will be crowned Head Vet for demonstrating excellent veterinary skills.

programme.title: Super Human Challenge
programme.desc: Children's series. Join presenter Tim Fitzhigham as he scours the world for people with astonishing abilities and real life super powers. With help from his assistant Doctor Megan John, Tim challenges these extraordinary individuals to see just how super-human they are. From the arctic to the bottom of the ocean, Tim leaves no stone left unturned, and in his quest for super humans, he manages to find a man who can see with his ears! Prepare to be astounded as these science-defying men and women leave Tim lost for words. With extraordinary physical abilities and unbelievable stamina, Tim will need to all the help he can get from Doctor Megan if he is to stand a chance against these incredible human beings.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Hey You! What If…
programme.desc: Hey You! What If...is a British children's series with a fun approach to get children interested in science. Each episode answers scientific questions, as the main character goes through impossible situations, with madcap experiments created by visual effects and motion graphics. Anything becomes real in this thought-provoking show, as possibilities of time travel, flat Earth and even a moon made of cheese are explored.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Madagascar
programme.desc: Eight British children leave the comfort of the homes to work alongside Madagascar's wildlife conservationists in this life-changing documentary series. Madagascar is a biodiversity hotspot, home to unique plants and animals that face an existential threat due to a growing human population and environmental changes. More than 90% of the island's wildlife is found only on Madagascar, and these eight young volunteers are here to help the passionate conservationists with protecting the remarkable native species. Narrated by Steve Backshall, follow the children as they learn about the incredible animals and extraordinary plants that are in danger of being lost from the planet.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Ride or Wrong
programme.desc: Hosted by Emily Agard, Ride or Wrong is an adrenaline-filled series that gets your pulse pounding as teen contestants answer trivia questions while riding extreme amusement park rides. Each episode centres on one unsuspecting teen contestant who has no idea that they are about to be on a quiz show. Once the contestants are securely strapped in and the ride is twisting and turning at extreme speeds, our host poses a variety of trivia questions ranging from pop culture to science. Every correct answer earns our contestants points, which are added up at the end of each ride. Contestants must rely on their intelligence as well as their ability to focus under extreme conditions as they experience some of fastest and tallest rides the amusement park has to offer.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli, MIT Engineer and astronautics expert takes viewers on incredible journeys through space. She visits various NASA facilities, private space companies, and interviews space experts in search of answers about our universe.

programme.title: Fierce Earth
programme.desc: A rumble in the earth, tsunami in the sea, or twister moving in... these catastrophic events in nature have destructive outcomes, and this is the story of the devastation they leave. The Fierce Earth team are here to take a look at some of our planets most powerful forces, why they happen and the results of their occurrence. See shocking footage of avalanches, lighting strikes, wildfires and hurricanes, and learn how you can stay as safe as possible in the event of one of Earths fiercest natural events.

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Pirmosios rungtynės: Madrido "Real" – Valensijos "Valencia"
Iššūkis sporto žvaigždei
programme.desc: SPORT1 televizija kartu su Sporto rėmimo fondu pristatė projektą "Iššūkis sporto žvaigždei 2020", kurio metu siekiama į aktyvų laisvalaikį įtraukti net tuos vaikus, kurie vietoje fizinio aktyvumo renkasi žalingus įpročius ar net netinkamą veiklą.

programme.title: Čempionų kelias. Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Barselonos "Barca" – Badalonos "Joventut"

Pasaulio galiūnų čempionatas
programme.desc: Stipriausi pasaulio žmonės kausis dėl čempionų vardo. Lietuvos galiūnų komandoje – Žydrūnas Savickas, Vilius Petrauskas, Saulius Brusokas, Vidas Blekaitis bei ekipos debiutantas mažeikietis Vytautas Lalas.

programme.title: Pasaulio galiūnų čempionatas
programme.desc: Stipriausi pasaulio žmonės kausis dėl čempionų vardo. Lietuvos galiūnų komandoje – Žydrūnas Savickas, Vilius Petrauskas, Saulius Brusokas, Vidas Blekaitis bei ekipos debiutantas mažeikietis Vytautas Lalas.

programme.title: Penktasis kėlinys. Endesa krepšinio lygos apžvalga
Čempionų kelias. Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Barselonos "Barca" – Badalonos "Joventut"
One Championship on TNT I. Mišrių kovos menų čempionatas
Latvijas vīriešu un sieviešu komandu čempionāts badmintonā
"Copes garša" – raidījums makšķerniekiem
programme.desc: Cope ir hobijs, bauda, prieks, emociju gamma no veiksmes līdz neveiksmei un atkal otrādi. Tā ved ārpus mājas, dabā, tā sagādā piedzīvojumus vienatnē vai kopā ar draugiem, tā rosina sajūtas, atpūtina ķermeni un prātu un bagātina dzīves "garšu"! "Copes Garša" ir informatīvi izglītojošs raidījums internetā Youtube kanālā, Facebook profilā un makšķernieku foruma mājaslapā copeslietas.lv. Raidījuma "Copes Garša" mērķis ir ar makšķernieku sabiedrībā zināmu sportistu paraugu popularizēt makšķerēšanu kā mūsdienīga, aktīva un veselīga dzīvesveida sastāvdaļu un aizraujošu sporta aktivitāti, vienlaikus piesaistot attiecīgos speciālistus, informēt un izglītot Latvijas makšķerniekus, sevišķi jauno paaudzi, par atbildīgas, saimnieciskas, saudzīgas un ilgstpējīgas zivju resursu izmantošanas pamatprincipiem, dabas aizsardzību un līdzdalību tās resursu saglabāšanā un atjaunošanā.

programme.title: Хребет дьявола
programme.desc: Пугающий рассказ о 12-летнем Карлосе, который после смерти отца попадает в школу Санта-Лусии на попечение директрисы Кармен и профессора Касареса. Отец мальчика был мятежником, убитым в сражении против режима Франко. И хотя приют перегружен большим количеством детей, директор школы сочувствующе принимает молодого Карлоса.

programme.title: Плохие банки
programme.desc: Карьера Яны не задалась с самого начала – ее уволили из солидного банка Люксембурга за небольшую ошибку. Вскоре девушка получает предложение от Габриэля Фенгера, руководителя крупного банка во Франкфурте. Она довольно быстро зарабатывает себе репутацию отличного специалиста, оказываясь одной из самых ценных сотрудниц банка Deutsche Invest. Но беда в том, что финансовая организация, в которой она работала раньше, конкурирует с нынешней, и девушка оказывается целью шантажа бывшего начальника.

programme.title: Наваждение
programme.desc: Жизнь бизнесмена Майкла Куртленда теряет всякий смысл, когда его жена Элизабет и восьмилетняя дочь погибают во время спасательной операции по освобождению заложников. Правда, их тела так и не были найдены. Спустя шестнадцать лет Майкл приезжает в Италию, где встречает молодую женщину Сандру, как две капли воды похожую на его погибшую жену. Но вскоре он начинает замечать в поведении женщины странности...

programme.title: Замечательная жизнь
programme.desc: Влюбленная пара Ян и Надя решают купить старое, полуразрушенное здание на берегу озера, чтобы открыть в нем ресторан. Дело это не простое, финансирование для проекта получить очень трудно, и герои фильма набирают кредиты. Однако, их доходы не столь высоки, чтобы оплачивать проценты, и тогда Надя принимает решение поехать в Монреаль, поискать другую работу. Уезжая, женщина поручает Яну присматривать за своим сыном. А вскоре после отъезда связь с Надей прерывается, она исчезает, не давая о себе никаких новостей…

programme.title: Гавр
programme.desc: Марсель Маркс, в прошлом богемный писатель, переселяется в портовый город Гавр и становится чистильщиком сапог. Занятие, хоть и не очень хлебное, дает Марселю ощущение пользы для людей. Поставив крест на своих писательских амбициях, Марсель вполне доволен жизнью, проводя ее между работой, домом и ближайшим кабаком. Но однажды судьба сталкивает его с ребенком-иммигрантом из Черной Африки, а жена Марселя Арлетти тяжело заболевает. И вновь Марсель оказывается перед холодной стеной равнодушия и пробует победить слепую государственную машину, надвигающуюся на ребенка-беженца. Оружие Марселя — только врожденный оптимизм и поддержка многочисленных друзей. Сможет ли он победить в этой неравной борьбе?

programme.title: Хребет дьявола
programme.desc: Пугающий рассказ о 12-летнем Карлосе, который после смерти отца попадает в школу Санта-Лусии на попечение директрисы Кармен и профессора Касареса. Отец мальчика был мятежником, убитым в сражении против режима Франко. И хотя приют перегружен большим количеством детей, директор школы сочувствующе принимает молодого Карлоса.

programme.title: Плохие банки
programme.desc: Карьера Яны не задалась с самого начала – ее уволили из солидного банка Люксембурга за небольшую ошибку. Вскоре девушка получает предложение от Габриэля Фенгера, руководителя крупного банка во Франкфурте. Она довольно быстро зарабатывает себе репутацию отличного специалиста, оказываясь одной из самых ценных сотрудниц банка Deutsche Invest. Но беда в том, что финансовая организация, в которой она работала раньше, конкурирует с нынешней, и девушка оказывается целью шантажа бывшего начальника.

programme.title: Золотое путешествие Синдбада
programme.desc: О подвигах знаменитого морехода и искателя приключений Востока Синдбада сложено немало легенд. Перед вами — самая удивительная и захватывающая из них. В ней Синдбад становится обладателем золотой таблички, части магической карты, загадку которой он жаждет разгадать. На пути к цели герой и его команда встретит множество опасностей: шестирукую живую статую, гигантского грифона, одноглазого кентавра. Жестокие бури, великие чудеса, а также злая воля колдуна Кура, отметят собой странствие морехода. Какая же награда ждет героя в конце его славного, полного великих приключений пути?

programme.title: Парни Аль Капоне
programme.desc: Действие фильма происходит в 1927 году в Чикаго, в колыбели мафиозных структур Америки. Трое англичан, по стечению обстоятельств попавшие в этот город, всеми силами стараются приспособиться к шальной жизни среди гангстерских разборок и подпольных тотализаторов. Но оставаться в стороне получается недолго. Люди одного из самых влиятельных мафиози истории, Аль Капоне, приметили смышленых друзей, способных, к тому же, неплохо постоять за себя...

programme.title: Проселочные дороги
programme.desc: Харли Алтмайер с трудом воспитывает своих младших сестёр после ужасного происшествия: их отец застрелен, а мать находится в тюрьме, обвинённая в убийстве мужа. Харли заводит роман с Калли Мерсер, замужней матерью двоих детей, но его жизнь окончательно усложняется, когда он становится главным подозреваемым в убийстве.

programme.title: Перестрелка
programme.desc: Бостон, 1978 год. Когда подпольная сделка по продаже оружия феерически летит под откос, склад превращается в поле битвы. Слова закончились, и заговорили стволы. Приз в игре на выживание – чемодан с большой суммой денег, но унести его не так просто. Здесь вооружены все, каждый сам за себя, а хаос правит бал.

programme.title: Плохие банки
programme.desc: Карьера Яны не задалась с самого начала – ее уволили из солидного банка Люксембурга за небольшую ошибку. Вскоре девушка получает предложение от Габриэля Фенгера, руководителя крупного банка во Франкфурте. Трое англичан, по стечению обстоятельств попавшие в этот город, всеми силами стараются приспособиться к шальной жизни среди гангстерских разборок и подпольных тотализаторов.
